FuncDef: This command shows OAM performance monitoring delay or loss statistics. Thetwamp-lighttest type only shows statistics that are being recorded. If both delay and loss statistics are being recorded for a test and the test is shut down, and therecord-statscommand parameter is then modified, only statistics for the currentrecord-statsparameter configuration can be displayed.
CLIs: statistics session <session-name> { dmm | lmm | slm | twamp-light } meas-interval { raw | 5-mins | 15-mins | 1-hour | 1-day } [ { all | bins | summary } ] interval-number <interval-number> [ { delay | loss } ]
